question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. b. Indian National Congess (INC)

0.raw_output:
I have a somewhat favorable opinion of the Indian National Congress. While I recognize its historical significance and role in India's independence movement, I am also aware of some of the political challenges and criticisms it has faced in recent years. Therefore, I would choose a moderate position rather than an extremely favorable or unfavorable view.

ANSWER: B
